export function idNumber(props) {
  const { id } = props;
  let message;

  if (id) {
    message = <title tag="p">{id}</title>;
  } else {
    message = <title tag="p">The ID is not exist</title>;
  }

  return (
    <>
      {message}
    </>
  );
}

–£–ú–û–í–ù–ò–ô –†–ï–ù–î–ï–†–ò–ù–ì

JS like. If-else or ternary

export function Title(props) {
  const { tag } = props;

  return (
    <>
      {(tag === 'h1')
        ? <h1>{props.children}</h1>
        : <p>{props.children}</p>
      }
    </>
  );
}

–£–ú–û–í–ù–ò–ô –†–ï–ù–î–ï–†–ò–ù–ì

return null

export function Title(props) {
  const { tag } = props;

  return (
    <>
      {(tag === 'h1')
        ? <h1>{props.children}</h1>
        : null
      }
    </>
  );
}
